mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as count, mname, mcount, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(mpw),'Daiso') as pw FROM member WHERE mid=#{id} AND mgrade > 4
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mcount=mcount+1 WHERE mid=#{id}
UPDATE member SET mcount=1 WHERE mid=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mid, mpw, mname, memail) VALUES (#{mid}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{mpw}, 'Daiso')), #{mname}, #{memail})
